entry.title: Saaransh
entry.content: Devastated to learn that their only son has been killed by muggers in New York City, former Headmaster B.B. Pradhan and his wife, Parvati, grieve. With their son dead, there is no source of income for the couple, so they rent out a room, in their Shivaji Park – Bombay apartment to a budding Bollywood actress, Sujata Suman, who has been having an illicit affair with the only son – Vilas of a politician named Gajanan Chitre. Vilas lacks the guts to tell his father that he is in love and would like to marry Sujata, and hence puts off any marriage plans. They do get intimate and as a result Sujata gets pregnant. When Pradhan finds out, he offers to take Sujata to meet Gajanan with the hope that he will permit her to become his daughter-in-law. But Gajanan not only refuses, he also threatens them, he warns them of dire consequences if Sujata does not abort the child, and moves away to another town. Pradhan refuses to let Sujata out of his house, and then begins the stalking and harassment by Gajanan’s men. Pradhan goes to file a police complaint, but is told that the police cannot even touch Gajanan’s men. Sujata has no choice but to continue to seek shelter with Pradhan and his wife. Sujata does not know that Pradhan and Parvati have a secret agenda of their own in keeping her within their sight.

entry.title: Piya Ka Ghar
entry.content: Piya Ka Ghar is a Classic Bollywood Movie, directed by Basu Chatterjee, starring Jaya Bhaduri, Anil Dhawan & Ranjita Thakur.

entry.title: Mr. X in Bombay
entry.content: Sudarshan (Kishore Kumar), is a talented poet who crosses paths with a young artist, Shobha (Kum Kum) and instantly falls in love with her. Sudarshan is a simpleton while Shobha is very modern girl. Shobha lives a wealthy lifestyle with her father, Professor Mathur who is now carrying out experiments on various issues. One day, Sudarshan goes to meet Shobha at her house but ends up being the guinea pig for her father’s experiment. Soon a series of paranormal events follow that alter the lives of everyone. What effects does the experiment bring upon Sudarshan?

entry.title: Jazbaat
entry.content: When Sapna – the sensational stage singer of national fame – comes to perform in her small native town, everyone is thrilled and excited. Inspector Kumar personally supervises all the arrangements of the show. Sapna’s phenomenal success is his personal triumph. It was he who had persuaded Sapna – then a pick-pocket – to give up the path of crime and be a “Good Girl”. Few people knew the burden of guilt that he carried within his heart : How one evening Sapna had asked him whether he would agree to marry her and how he had hesitated. She had gone away, determined to be Somebody and today she had returned as a successful, renowned singer.But in the meantime, Inspector Kumar had spent innumerable sleepless nights thinking over his hesitation and now that he had come to love her, the gulf between the two appears unbridgeable. Today Sapna was wealthy, famous and successful star-singer while he remained only a humble police officer! What happens when the two protagonists meet face to face “Jazbaat” is the answer!

entry.title: Humkadam
entry.content: Humkadam – Hindi Full Length Movie – 1980. Producer:Tarachand Barjatya, Directed by : Anil Ganguly, Cast :Rakhee Gulzar, Parikshit Sahani, A. K. Hangal, Dina Pathak, Helen, Dinesh Hingoo, Ritu Kamal, Madan Puri, Iftekhar, Baby Geeta, Biswajeet, Music Director: Bappi Lahiri.
